query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.sendtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.operatedeptid in (@revDeptId@) and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.operatedeptid is not null

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.sendtime,est.senddeptid from est_netchange est where est.sendtime>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.operatedeptid='@s1@' and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.operatedeptid is not null

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: est.sendtime>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.operatedeptid in (@revDeptId@) and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.mainid not in (select distinct est1.mainid from est_netchange est1 where est1.status=1 and (est1.mainifrecord is null or est1.mainifrecord=0) and est1.operatetype=113 and est1.mainExecuteEndDate<est1.operatetime) and est.operatedeptid is not null

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.sendtime,est.senddeptid from est_netchange est where est.sendtime>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.operatedeptid='@s1@' and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.mainid not in (select distinct est1.mainid from est_netchange est1 where est1.status=1 and (est1.mainifrecord is null or est1.mainifrecord=0) and est1.operatetype=113 and est1.mainExecuteEndDate<est1.operatetime) and est.operatedeptid is not null

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.sendtime,est.senddeptid from est_netchange est where est.sendtime>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.operatedeptid='@s1@' and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.operatetype=113 and est.mainExecuteEndDate<est.operatetime and est.operatedeptid is not null

query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.sendtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.operateroleid in (@revRoleid@) and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.operateroleid is not null and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32
